success_case_list.title: Case Study: The Pierre & Vacances – Center Parcs Group
success_case_list.description: Thanks to an enlarged and accessible IT monitoring system, the Pierre & Vacances Center Parcs Group speaks the Business language. success_case_list.description: Fibre Excellence professionalizes its critical IT equipment and application monitoring with Centreon. success_case_list.description: Centreon’s IT monitoring solution helps Fondation de France achieve its goal of efficiency, traceability and transparency. success_case_list.title: Case study: French departmental council of Haut-Rhin
success_case_list.description: By centralizing its monitoring with Centreon, the departmental council of Haut-Rhin (France) increases its productivity and proactiveness! success_case_list.title: Case study: NC2, a Managed Service Provider that is part of global group Visiativ
success_case_list.description: NC2, subsidiary of Visiativ Group, reinforces its commitment to clients by making Centreon EMS a standard feature of managed services agreements. NC2, a Managed Service Provider (MSP) that is part of global group Visiativ, has made the IT monitoring solution Centreon EMS a standard feature of all its service agreements.
